You are about to download over your cellular network. Continue?

Help us make your experience better by submitting your Android Device info. We promise not to collect your personally identifiable information (name, address, e-mail address, social security number, or other unique identifiers).
Enable Ultra Download and enjoy a faster download speed
Ultra Download is still in beta. let us know if you encounter any problems. You can easily disable it in Settings.

Failed to request app asset information.

Your device isn\'t compatible with this app.

This app may not be usable.

We need to access your external storage. Please make sure it\'s usable.
We need to access your external storage. Please make sure the permission is granted.
Turning this on will reduce image size and quality to help use less cellular data.
Ultra Download is still in beta. Let us know if you encounter any problems.
Supports Android 4.1 and above. No root access needed.
Auto Install requires the permission from you. 100% safe.

Enable "APKPure Auto Install" to keep APKPure "Auto Install" running smoothly.

"APKPure Auto Install" can save your time on clicking install buttons when installing or updating apks. And you don't have to check your phone all the time.

Once enabling this feature, you may receive system risk warnings. Please tap "OK" to turn the accessibility switch "ON".

To ensure APKPure well functioning, please add APKPure "White List" in your anti-virus app.

The functions mentioned above support Android 4.1 and above. No root permissions are needed. We promise we will never ever collect any of your personal information in this accessibility service. Please feel free to contact us for any problems.
Only for rooted Android phones and tablets.

failed to Scan. Please try again.

1. Approved recommendations will be listed under the DISCOVER section.\n 2. You can only recommend the apps currently installed on your Android device.\n 3. Notify APKPure to add not indexed apps, please finish the recommendation forms first.

It looks like something you posted doesn\'t follow our %1$s. We don\'t allow bullying or harassment of any kind, including inappropriate photos, videos on physical bullying, or any other posts intended to degrade or humiliate a specific person. \n%2$s \nIf you think this was a mistake, please %3$s.
You\'re Temporarily Banned From Creating Content On APKPure

"This temporary ban will last %1$s days, and you won\'t be able to create content on APKPure until it expires. If you post something that goes against our %2$s again, you account will be banned for another 30 days. Please keep in mind that people who repeatedly post inappropriate content may cause their accounts permanently banned. \n If you think this was a mistake, please %3$s."
